member.name: T:BestChat.Prefs.Ctrls.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Ctrls.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Ctrls.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Ctrls.Resources.strGlobalName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to _Global.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Ctrls.Resources.strGlobalNameToolTipText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to These preferences affect the entire application..
